comments.comments_text: Goal! A mistake from the defence gifted a chance to a lurking Ollie Watkins (Aston Villa), who keeps his cool and rolls the ball into the net from close range. 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! A mistake from the defence gifted a chance to a lurking [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who keeps his cool and rolls the ball into the net from close range. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Naby Keita (Liverpool). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Ollie Watkins (Aston Villa) weaves his way past opponents, and he unleashes a magnificent effort from the edge of the box into the top right corner. Adrian had no chance of reaching it. The score is 2:0.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball into the top left corner. It's 2:1.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! John McGinn (Aston Villa) tries his luck from the edge of the box and his shot takes a deflection and goes past the stranded Adrian. He makes it 3:1.

comments.comments_text: Trezeguet sends a superb cross into the box. Ollie Watkins (Aston Villa) latches on to it and from close range plants a header inside the right post, leaving Adrian beaten. He displayed his eye for goal there - excellent finish. The score is 4:1.
